overview.description: React-based web application for overlaying AI annotations on original note images. Extracts annotation layers from AI-processed images and composites them with high-quality originals, supporting both single and batch processing modes.

key_components.name: App
key_components.description: Main application component managing mode switching (single/batch), file state, processing options, and preview generation. Orchestrates the entire user workflow.

key_components.name: ImageProcessor
key_components.description: Core image processing engine implementing pixel-level difference detection, annotation layer extraction, and alpha blending algorithms. Handles image scaling and format conversion.

key_components.name: FileUtils
key_components.description: File handling utilities for single and batch operations, including ZIP packaging with JSZip, file naming, validation, and download management.

key_components.name: BatchProcessor
key_components.description: Batch processing component with drag-and-drop file upload, automatic file pairing based on naming patterns, progress tracking, and bulk download functionality.

key_components.name: ImageUploader
key_components.description: Reusable file upload component with drag-and-drop support, file validation, and preview display for single image selection.

key_components.name: ProcessingPanel
key_components.description: Control panel component for adjusting processing parameters (threshold, opacity, color inversion) and triggering preview/download actions.

key_components.name: ImagePreview
key_components.description: Image preview component displaying processed results with titles and subtitles, used in the 4-panel preview grid.
